Summary Note:
Roose Vandenberghe Peiren and the RM crossed paths at a tech conference in Brussels. They attended several keynote sessions together and realized they had a shared vision for the future of technology investments.
With a career spanning nearly 33 years, Roose Vandenberghe Peiren has established himself as a key player in the industry.
He decided to join Julius Baer for its renowned wealth management services and personalized client approach.
Family Background: Roose Vandenberghe Peiren is currently divorced. He does not have any children.
Education Background:
Roose obtained his secondary school diploma from Onze-Lieve-Vrouwecollege in 1986.
In 1991, Roose graduated from Solvay Brussels School of Economics and Management with a degree.
He also pursued further higher education at Brussels School of International Studies, graduating in 1996.
Occupation History:
Having worked for over 33 years, Roose Vandenberghe Peiren brings a wealth of experience and expertise to his current role. He is known for his strategic thinking and ability to drive results.
In 1992, Roose Vandenberghe Peiren started working as a Plant Manager at Nyrstar NV, marking the beginning of his successful career.
He then transitioned to Bekaert SA as a Operations Director, leveraging his expertise to drive results from 1999 to 2000.
At ArcelorMittal Belgium NV, he worked as a CEO from 2002 to 2006, focusing on strategic initiatives and team collaboration.
He worked as a Chairman at Umicore SA from 2008 to 2010, playing a pivotal role in shaping the company's vision and strategy.
As a Conglomerate Owner at Nyrstar NV since 2012, he remains committed to excellence, driving progress and inspiring others through his remarkable leadership.
Wealth Summary:
He managed to save approximately 1070000 EUR from his earnings at all companies.
He has villa located in Brussels, worth 2070000 EUR.

He purchased villa in Maaseik, where he spends his holidays. It is valued at 2330000 EUR.

In addition to his career success, he also received an inheritance of 4820000 EUR from his late grandfather, a renowned Hedge Fund Manager, in 2005.
Client Summary: In conclusion, we are confident in the client's financial stability and future prospects.
